mapper.sql: id, code, name, province_id, city_id, county_id, status, remark, createTime, updateTime, createUser, updateUser
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_company
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_company
id,
code,
name,
province_id,
city_id,
county_id,
status,
remark,
createTime,
updateTime,
createUser,
updateUser,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=BIT},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_company
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUser = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateUser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_company set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createUser = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateUser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_company
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateUser = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_company set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createUser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateUser = #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_company
order by ${orderByClause}
select r.id as companyid,r.name as companyName from t_company r where r.status = 1 order by r.id

select * from v_root_in a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_sex a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_user_status a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_cosmetologist a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_counsoler a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_project_inventory a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
(sum(IF (a.`status` = 1,IF (a.chu_fu_zhen = 0,ifnull(b.total_amount, 0),0),0)) / 10000) c_total_amount, (sum(IF (a.`status` = 1,IF (a.chu_fu_zhen = 1,ifnull(b.total_amount, 0),0),0)) / 10000) f_total_amount, sum(ifnull(b.total_amount, 0)) / 10000 AS total_amont, sum(IF (a.`status` = 1,IF (a.chu_fu_zhen = 0, 1, 0),0)) CHUZHEN, sum(IF (a.`status` = 1,IF (a.chu_fu_zhen = 1, 1, 0),0)) FUZHEN, sum(IF (a.`status` = 99,1,0)) employeeWastageOrder, count(a.id) employeeTotalOrder, tsu.nickname FROM t_ltn_customer a LEFT JOIN (select sum(b.total_amount)total_amount,b.customer_id as id from t_ltn_customer_consumpton_amount b LEFT JOIN t_ltn_customer b1 ON b.customer_id = b1.id WHERE b1.`status` = 1 GROUP BY b.customer_id) b on a.id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user tsu on a.counsoler = tsu.id where 1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{starttime}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endtime}
and a.company_id = #{companyid}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y'),a.counsoler,tsu.nickname
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m'),a.counsoler,tsu.nickname
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m%d'),a.counsoler,tsu.nickname
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m%d'),a.counsoler,tsu.nickname
order by datetime asc,total_amont desc

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
tsu.nickname, tc.`name` as companyname, count(tcs.id) totalOrder, sum(if(tcs.`status`=1,1,0)) secuessOrder, sum(if(tcs.`status`=99,1,0)) wastageOrder, sum(if(tcs.`status`=0,1,0)) unfinishedOrder FROM t_customer_subscribe tcs LEFT JOIN t_sys_user tsu ON tcs.create_user = tsu.username LEFT JOIN t_company tc ON tcs.company_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN v_root_in vri on tcs.root_in = vri.`value` and vri.companyid = tcs.company_id LEFT JOIN v_sex vs on tcs.sex=vs.`value` and vs.companyid = tcs.company_id LEFT JOIN v_subscribe vss on tcs.`status` = vss.`value` and vss.companyid= tcs.company_id where 1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{starttime}
and DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endtime}
and tcs.company_id = #{companyid}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
ORDER BY datetime asc,totalOrder desc
